channel.title: Course Development Documentation on McMaster CCE
channel.description: Recent content in Course Development Documentation on McMaster CCE

item.title: Dropbox
item.description: We use Dropbox to share files. The following table lists the files that you will use for integration located in the Dropbox/CCE Development - Templates/6. LST Templates folder. If you have not been added to our Dropbox contact an LST. The files in the Dropbox get updated frequently. Always grab a new copy of these files before beginning integration of a course. Location Purpose Default Turnitin Settings.

item.title: Internal Files
item.description: The following information is for internal LSTs. Below you will find details on where internal network share files are located and the purpose that they serve. Location Purpose N:\CCE Course Development Internal course development team folder. N:\CCE Course Development\Courses Within a particular course folder there are course development files and a copy of all of the files as the appear in the Manage Files area of the course in Avenue.

item.title: CCE Course Template
item.description: The CCE Course Template in Avenue contains all of the neccessary files and Grade settings to begin integrating a course. Copy all componeents from the CCE Course Template into your course master shell before beginning integration. If you are not able to access the CCE Course Template in Avenue contact an LST. You are required to have a MacID to access Avenue. Template Files The following table provides a breakdown of the various files and folders in the Manage Files(Course Admin > Manage Files) area of the CCE Course Template.
